description: It isn't much, but it'll get the job done.
name: Chipped Axe

description: So sharp I can skin dinner with it.
name: Sharpened Axe

description: I've lost count of the number of goblins slaughtered by its razor edge.
name: Well Used Axe

description: This axe has seen a thousand battles, and been victorious in every one.
name: Many-notched Axe

description: They're a bit heavy, but they keep my beard in check.
name: Iron Beard Clips

description: Lighter than your average clips, they let my beard swing furiously when I attack.
name: Steel Beard Clips

description: Crafted from a meteorite that fell near Icewind Dale.
name: Dark Iron Beard Clips

description: Ancient family clips found in the depths of the Mithral Hall.
name: Gold Beard Clips of the Clan

description: It'll hold up your pants, if you don't move around too quickly.
name: Frayed Belt

description: It's seen better days, but it still does the trick.
name: Faded Leather Belt

description: It's quite slimming!
name: Thick Sturdy Belt

description: An ancient family belt recovered from a Battlehammer heirloom cache.
name: Golden Hide Belt of the Ancestors

description: A simple ring with little magical power.
name: Plain Iron Ring

description: A shiny ring that seems to radiate mild heat on its own.
name: Shiny Steel Ring

description: A magical ring crafted from a fallen meteorite.
name: Dark Iron Ring

description: Specially crafted by the craftsmen in Mirabar as a peace offering to Clan Battlehammer.
name: Golden Sigil Ring of Dwarves

description: Looks like someone took a warhammer to this.
name: Dented Shield

description: If you can get it up in time, it'll do the job.
name: Heavy Shield

description: It's strong enough to stop a blow from a raging giant.
name: Strong Shield

description: A magical shield with secret and mysterious powers.
name: Shield of Foaming Ale

description: To be fair, I think it's supposed to be broken.
name: Broken Helm

description: Someone needs to get some spit and polish on this thing.
name: Scuffed Helm

description: Stronger than steel, and far lighter.
name: Mithral Helm

description: This helm has seen Bruenor through a hundred sticky situations.
name: Gilded Helm of Clan Battlehammer

description: An understated headband with a small blue gem.
name: Iron Headband

description: A scuffed headband with brilliant potential.
name: Silver Headband

description: A complex headband composed of dozens of golden leaves.
name: Gold Headband

description: A golden headband inlaid with a brilliant blue sapphire.
name: Ornate Headband of Faith

description: They'll keep the dust off my hands, at least.
name: Cloth Gauntlets

description: The inside is padded to protect against bumps and bruises.
name: Leather Gauntlets

description: Masterfully crafted to fit my hands precisely.
name: Golden Gauntlets

description: The small inlaid sapphires - tears of Selûne herself - empower myself and my allies.
name: Scale Gauntlets of Selûne

description: A basic belt from a simpler time in my life.
name: Cloth Belt

description: Given to me by a sister cleric on my first day of worship at the temple.
name: Soft Belt

description: This belt has saved my life in battle many times.
name: Thick Scalemail Belt

description: The texture of this belt matches exactly the face of the goddess above.
name: Obsidian Scale Belt of the Moon

description: Commonly carried by many of Selûne's acolytes.
name: Iron Amulet

description: A more durable form of a commonly carried amulet.
name: Steel Amulet

description: Often mistaken for gold, this amulet shines nearly as bright.
name: Copper Amulet

description: One of the few relics recovered from Shadowmantle's undead horde.
name: Golden Amulet of the Goddess

description: Comfortable, but not ideal for long journeys such as this one.
name: Cloth Boots

description: Durable and soft, these boots can last a lifetime if properly cared for.
name: Smooth Leather Boots

description: Not the stealthiest boot, but then stealth was never my style.
name: Chainmail Boots

description: One of Selûne's skilled followers crafted these for me after I saved them.
name: Well Fitted Boots of Fellowship

description: Though old, this item still holds a dear place in my heart.
name: Faded Holy Symbol

description: Never underestimate the wrath of an angry goddess.
name: Understated Holy Symbol

description: A fine tribute to the true goddess of the night sky.
name: Ornate Holy Symbol

description: Bestowed upon me by the goddess herself in my greatest time of need.
name: Holy Symbol of Selûne's Grace

description: A faded owl motif. Someday I'll tell you the story of it.
name: Faded Figurine

description: A magical item used to hunt down those who have done wrong.
name: Hunting Figurine

description: A brilliant serpentine owl figurine imbued with magical power.
name: Detailed Owl Figurine

description: A wondrous item that grants me the power to track down those I've sworn vengeance against.
name: Figurine Of Wondrous Power

description: It's starting to rust, but it can still take a few good blows.
name: Tarnished Breastplate

description: A sturdy breastplate. Well enough to deliver evenhanded justice in, at least.
name: Iron Breastplate

description: A fine breastplate, crafted using a special steel alloy known only to a few.
name: Ornate Breastplate

description: It borders on gaudy, but you can't deny its raw power.
name: Breastplate of the Devoted Champion

description: It restricts my movement, but not enough to hinder the Maimed God's justice.
name: Heavy Chainmail Shirt

description: As fine a shirt as you could expect to find, from a common merchant.
name: Fine Chainmail Shirt

description: Even dwarven folk can appreciate the need for Tyr's justice.
name: Dwarven Mithral Shirt

description: Gifted to me by Lord Maldwyn, shortly before... I'd rather not talk about it.
name: Finely Crafted Scalemail of Justice

description: Your run of the mill plate gauntlets.
name: Basic Gauntlets

description: They won't budge in battle, and with a sturdy wrist will deflect all but the strongest attack.
name: Sturdy Gauntlets

description: A finely crafted gauntlet worn by many Paladins throughout the land.
name: Paladin's Gauntlets

description: Pristine scalemail gauntlets that give my blows a little extra oomph.
name: Gauntlets of Sworn Vengeance

description: The symbol of Tyr strikes fear into evil-doers everywhere.
name: Simple Holy Symbol

description: This symbol has been meticulously cared for over the years. A great sign of respect.
name: Polished Holy Symbol

description: The Lord of Justice himself blessed this necklace.
name: Devoted Holy Symbol

description: I've devoted my life to justice for all in Tyr's name.
name: Extravagant Symbol of Tyr

description: A trainee's sword, but in the right hands, it can still do damage.
name: Dull Iron Greatsword

description: Crafted by the finest smithy in Daggerford.
name: Sharp Steel Greatsword

description: This sword vanquishes all foes, whether or not they come from this plane.
name: Strong Magical Greatsword

description: The Lord of Justice blessed this sword and my mission on his behalf.
name: Blessed Sword of Tyr

description: Good enough for the common folk, but I'll soon be upgrading, I assure you.
name: Common Rapier

description: You can't be very effective with an unbalanced sword, you know!
name: Well Balanced Rapier

description: There's nothing quite so elegant or majestic as a finely crafted rapier.
name: Majestic Rapier

description: When you need to put on a show, a rapier will often do the trick.
name: Swashbuckling Rapier of Last Resort

description: It does the job, but not much more.
name: Effective Eye Patch

description: Now that's a swashbuckling look!
name: Stylish Eye Patch

description: I've got a few more tricks up my sleeve. Or over my eye, rather.
name: Enhanced Eye Patch

description: You can't hide from my magical eye... patch.
name: Knave's Eye Patch

description: It's not a real feather at all! Why would someone do this?
name: Faux Feathered Hat

description: A decent enough feather, I suppose. In a pinch.
name: Gull Feathered Hat

description: It's a pleasure to wear, though not for my enemies.
name: Velvet Feathered Hat

description: You don't want to mess with this feather.
name: Magical Diatryma Feathered Hat

description: A quick dip in an enchanted underdark pool aught to brighten this right up.
name: Faded Cloak

description: A useful distraction if you want your foes to see your cloak and not yourself.
name: Brightly Colored Cloak

description: It has some use, but it could be so much more.
name: Lesser Piwafwi Cloak

description: With this cloak, I am all but invisible.
name: Many-hued Piwafwi Cloak

description: It once had magical powers, but now it's just an old piece of metal.
name: Dented Iron Ring

description: Rub it three times and a genie pops out. Aha! Gotcha! So gullible.
name: Scuffed Steel Ring

description: But what power, you ask? I'll never tell.
name: Ring of Power

description: If I know where my enemies will be, they're that much easier to hit.
name: Ornate Ring of Foresight

description: A simple accessory, but quite useful in the right situation.
name: Simple Spurs

description: Remind me sometime to tell you the story of how I came into possession of these.
name: Dull Steel Spurs

description: Dirty dwarven metal, sure, but you can't deny the craftsmanship.
name: Shiny Mithral Spurs

description: A stylish addition to any outfit!
name: Masterful Golden Spurs

description: It doesn't have to be fancy, but it will be messy.
name: Simple Crossbow Bolt

description: You don't want to be on the receiving end of this.
name: Sharpened Crossbow Bolt

description: It nearly doesn't fit in my lute!
name: Broadhead Crossbow Bolt

description: You really have to jam it in there, but it hurts when it comes out.
name: Expertly Fletched Crossbow Bolt

description: It sounds terrible, so what'll you give me to stop playing?
name: Untuned Lute

description: I've heard better, but it's a good focus for my songs and spells.
name: Partially Tuned Lute

description: Sturdy instruments are key to constant paydays.
name: Whitewood Lute

description: Hey, are you even listening to me? Argh! That's it...!
name: Ornate Lute of Ballads

description: It's a little scratchy, but it keeps me warm.
name: Rough Cloak

description: Your average bard's cloak. Good for blending into crowds... of bards.
name: Bard's Cloak

description: The only way this thing comes flying off in combat is if I'm feeling especially fabulous.
name: Triple-Clasped Cloak

description: You wouldn't think a bright red cloak could be stealthy, but here we are.
name: Stealthy Performer's Cloak

description: Comfortable, but not much help in combat.
name: Soft Leather Bracers

description: You could deflect a dull sword with these, if you're quick enough, which I am.
name: Stiff Hide Bracers

description: Some of the best wrist-based protection a girl can ask for.
name: Studded Leather Bracers

description: I know what you're thinking: aren't all bracers fingerless? Yeah, well... Shut up.
name: Fingerless Bracers of the Foul Mouth

description: You can't see it, but this thing is barely holding together.
name: Patched Bag

description: It's holding knick-knacks from dozens of passed out pirates. They won't miss 'em.
name: Sturdy Leather Bag

description: Touch the gem in the wrong way and boom! Hope you weren't too attached to that hand.
name: Magically Enhanced Satchel

description: I've seen plenty of the world, but I'm more than happy to see more of it.
name: Leather Satchel of the Wanderer

description: It's a little irritating, but it's stylish.
name: Dusty Eyepatch

description: A pleasure to wear - it's like a blanket for my eye!
name: Soft Cloth Eyepatch

description: A sturdy accessory that aids in my night time adventures.
name: Sturdy Leather Eyepatch

description: Oh, you want to know what my magical eyepatch does? Get in line, sailor.
name: Magical Eyepatch of the Bard

description: The tip isn't as fragile as it looks.
name: Simple Jade Spear

description: Crafted by the finest Aarakocra smiths in Kir Sabal.
name: Sharp Jade Spear

description: Imbued with magical power by the wizards of Kir Sabal.
name: Magical Jade Spear

description: The finest spear I've seen in all my years protecting the skies of Chult.
name: Ornate Jade Spear of the Mind

description: This orb causes the air around you to shift and swirl.
name: Orb of Breezes

description: This orb causes the air around you to gust and blow your robes.
name: Orb of Gusts

description: This orb causes a strong wind to swirl past you, making footing difficult.
name: Orb of Squalls

description: Without proper discipline, this orb could cause you to be swept off your feet.
name: Hurricane Orb of Storms

description: This robe has clearly seen better days.
name: Pilling Robe

description: This robe fits perfectly, and flutters about pleasingly as you fly.
name: Long Robe

description: A golden robe with light colors and brilliant golden cloud motifs.
name: Golden Robe

description: This robe seems to have a mind of its own, swirling about you even when the wind is calm.
name: Swirling Robe of Gusting Wind

description: A simple pouch for storing spell components and trinkets.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Asharra's Bond abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Simple Pouch

description: Twice the storage potential compared to single pouches!

effects.description: Increases the effect of Asharra's Bond abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Dual Cloth Pouches

description: A well loved pouch that I'd guess belonged to a lesser Aarakocra priest or cleric.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Asharra's Bond abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Hardened Leather Pouch

description: The components for nearly any spell you could imagine can be found in these pouches.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Asharra's Bond abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Bottomless Pouch of Components

description: A common necklace worn by the Aarakocra residents of Kir Sabal.
name: Common Aarakocra Necklace

description: This necklace has seen combat, but is still holding together well. It must be lucky!
name: Scuffed Aarakocra Necklace

description: This fine necklace obviously belonged to a powerful Aarakocra at some point in the past.
name: Jeweled Aarakocra Necklace

description: The craftsmanship on this necklace puts all others to shame.
name: Masterfully Crafted Aarakocra Necklace

description: A simple armlet, but good enough for the time being.
name: Brass Armlet

description: A well loved armlet that its previous owner obviously adored.
name: Polished Armlet

description: A shiny armlet with what looks like a small citrine or amber set in it.
name: Jeweled Copper Armlet

description: A beautiful golden armlet set with a shining fire opal.
name: Magnificent Golden Armlet of Focus

description: Here's a tip for any adventurer: swords don't do so well against enemies made entirely of diamond.
name: Chipped Greatsword

description: Minsc has had this old blade nearly as long as he's been adventuring with Boo.
name: Well Used Greatsword

description: Minsc just got this sharpened by a smithy in Baldur's Gate. Good fellow. Cheap.
name: Sharp Greatsword

description: Evil, meet my sword! Sword, meet evil!
name: Grand Greatsword of Furious Blows

description: Less vest, more buttkicking!
name: Basic Leather Vest

description: Smooth like a miniature giant space hamster's bottom! Smells like one, too!
name: Smooth Leather Vest

description: It's got holes for Minsc's extremely large biceps, so Minsc is a fan!
name: Reinforced Leather Vest

description: Boo! Are you comfortable up there?
name: Padded Leather Vest of Hamster Perches

description: They may be cheap, but they do keep Minsc from lopping his own hands off.
name: Cheap Iron Bracers

description: Hey, who are you calling dull?! Oh, the bracers. Yeah, they're pretty dull.
name: Dull Iron Bracers

description: This reminds Minsc of a time... never mind.
name: Full Iron Bracers

description: Adventuring is quite exciting - at least until it's not. Then you need to be comfortable.
name: Padded Iron Bracers of Comfort

description: It could use a little more color. Minsc knows a fellow in Waterdeep...

effects.description: Increases the effect of Minsc's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Faded Purple Cloak

description: A decent enough cloak. If you're into normal things like that.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Minsc's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Smooth Purple Cloak

description: Oh! It's so soft! Don't even think about stealing it to nest in, Boo!

effects.description: Increases the effect of Minsc's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Purple Velvet Cloak

description: Minsc saves some king's daughter, and this is all he gets? Barely worth it!

effects.description: Increases the effect of Minsc's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Silken Cloak of the Beloved Ranger

description: Perhaps you will upgrade this belt the next time you are in town, yes?
name: Fraying Belt

description: A good belt for long nights at the all-you-can-eat tavern!
name: Loose Belt

description: It's important to keep your pants up, lest boo bite you in hard to reach places.
name: Tight Leather Belt

description: Go for the belt, Boo! Go for the belt!
name: Comfortable Belt of Destruction

description: You don't need fancy boots to kick some bad guy butt!
name: Simple Ranger Boots

description: They've got good traction if we ever head up north to Icewind Dale.
name: Smooth Studded Boots

description: Solid buttkicking soles! Good find, Boo!
name: Solid Plate Boots

description: Some of these enemies need a swift kick in the morals!
name: Buttkicking Boots of Wrath

description: I prefer to stick to my magic, but in a pinch, I can use this.
name: Dull Iron Dagger

description: I borrowed this from a cutpurse in Baldur's Gate who thought he could steal from me.
name: Cutpurse's Dagger

description: I don't like to resort to violence, but if I have to, this'll do.
name: Sharp Steel Dagger

description: In a pinch, I can channel my spells through the ruby on this dagger.
name: Ruby Focused Dagger of Danger

description: Some trinket? It doesn't interest me, but it has some power within.
name: Pilfered Memento

description: This belonged to an acolyte of the Cult of the Dragon.
name: Follower's Necklace

description: Someone of great power wore this necklace. But they're gone, and I'm still here.
name: Master's Necklace

description: My twin brother's necklace. It's a long story, and I'd rather not get into it.
name: Dragon Cult Leader's Necklace

description: Very similar to the first focus given to me by my teacher.
name: Basic Orb

description: Getting your focus to hover in your hand is the first task assigned to novice sorcerers.
name: Hovering Orb

description: Channeling the Weave into your focus allows you to charge your spells.
name: Charged Orb

description: This magical artifact has been passed down through generations of elves.
name: Magical Orb of Elvenkind

description: More of a style piece than actually functional.
name: Loose Belt

description: A simple enough belt. The sheath has a few holes in it.
name: Simple Leather Belt

description: A fine gift from a young human who once fancied me.
name: Fine Belt and Sheath

description: I'm always up for an adventure! The more dangerous the better!
name: Golden Wayfarer's Belt of Adventure

description: A simple sorcerer's cape with more than a few holes.
name: Ratty Cape

description: Someone has recently cleaned the cape. It wasn't me!
name: Smooth Cape

description: I look like quite the mature and knowledgeable elf wearing this. Little do they know.
name: High Collared Cape

description: It may look flimsy, but I can shrug off most attacks wearing this.
name: Empowered Cape of Protection

description: I can't believe anyone would wear these! Better than nothing, I guess.
name: Scratchy Robes

description: Hey, these are actually pretty comfy! Good find!
name: Comfortable Robes

description: I've been searching for the master who crafted this for years. It's wondrous!
name: Masterful Silken Robe

description: My spells are empowered when I wear this cape. Not that they need to be.
name: Swirling Patterned Robe of Sorcery

description: A few sparks are a beginning, but they're certainly not an end.
name: Necklace of Sparks

description: We're going to need to do better than this.
name: Necklace of Flickers

description: Where there's smoke...
name: Necklace of Flame

description: This ought to draw their attention.
name: Golden Necklace of Fireballs

description: There's something a little off about this dagger.
name: Suspicious Dagger

description: Yeah, this dagger is clearly evil. But it does my bidding, so it's not all bad.
name: Evil Dagger

description: Allows me to focus my fiendish magic.
name: Twisted Dagger Focus

description: I'll do whatever it takes to achieve my goals.
name: Demonic Focus of Infernal Power

description: Holds enough components for a few hours of intense spellcasting.
name: Small Cloth Pouch

description: There's a hidden compartment in the back for even more components.
name: Stitched Leather Pouch

description: Finding black leather dye is extremely difficult. Luckily, I know a Fiend or two.
name: Dyed Leather Pouch

description: Demon hide is especially rare. They generally don't like to give it up.
name: Gilded Demon Hide Pouch

description: They... they tore my cape! The nerve!
name: Torn Cape

description: I'm really still quite evil, once you get to know me.
name: Dark Cape

description: Magnificent, much like myself!
name: Magnificent Cape

description: Don't worry, they weren't very nice souls to begin with.
name: Exquisite Cape of Souls

description: This has no real value to me. I've grown so far beyond its meager power.
name: Basic Warlock's Robe

description: A simple robe for a simple warlock. I've already outgrown it.
name: Apprentice's Robe

description: Finally, a robe worthy of my great power.
name: Gold Stitched Robe

description: The ends justify the means. I'll do whatever it takes.
name: Tasselled Robes of Justification

description: You can't make an omelette without burning a few belts.
name: Charred Belt

description: For some reason, my patron seems to like it when I wear black.
name: Blackened Belt

description: A rare gift from my patron, Arikas. It serves me well.
name: Fine Acolyte's Belt

description: An exquisite belt for those of us with fiendish tastes.
name: Skirted Belt of Demons

description: Even a splintered branch can do damage in the right hands.
name: Splintered Branch

description: It's a splinted splintered branch. Get it? Aww, you're no fun.
name: Patched Tree Branch

description: The twisting only serves to make it stronger.
name: Twisted Wooden Staff

description: The tree this staff came from is older than time itself.
name: Gnarled Staff of the Warden

description: A simple necklace for simple adventurers.
name: Dull Jade Necklace

description: There's something about jade that always tickles my fancy.
name: Shiny Jade Necklace

description: A fine necklace purchased from a merchant in Triboar.
name: Fine Jade Necklace

description: An ancient necklace found deep in the Neverwinter wood.
name: Woven Jade Necklace of the Forest

description: Fifty feet of strong hempen rope. Durable and versatile.
name: Plain Rope

description: It seems to want something... What do you want, little rope?
name: Twitching Rope

description: Good for getting to high places when there's nothing to tie rope to.
name: Magical Rope

description: It's easier for you if you don't fight it. It feeds on your struggles.
name: Empowered Rope of Entanglement

description: It's taken a few too many trips through the brambles, if you know what I mean.
name: Ripped Cloth Vest

description: A workable vest. Relatively new and uninitiated to nature.
name: Plain Cloth Vest

description: A fine shirt. I almost feel bad taking it out into the wild. Almost.
name: Fine Cloth Shirt

description: One of the few items I kept from my home village after... Nevermind.
name: Earthwarden's Shirt of Nature

description: It's may be out of tricks, but I've still got some up my sleeve.
name: Empty Bag of Tricks

description: Filled with powders to distract, to itch, to blind.
name: Basic Bag of Tricks

description: It's almost too heavy to carry. Perhaps that's a trick for its owner.
name: Hefty Bag of Tricks

description: There's a hint of magic in all of these tricks.
name: Mystical Tan Bag of Tricks

description: Crafted from a fallen branch donated by a very old and wise tree.
name: Wooden Ring

description: Moles have one of the keenest noses in the world, you know.
name: Basic Ring of the Mole

description: Frogs have many fine attributes that are quite useful when adventuring.
name: Fine Ring of the Frog

description: Much like the Porcupine, if you poke me, you'll regret it.
name: Exquisite Ring of the Porcupine

description: A bangle or two from my days as a youth.
name: Primitive Bangles

description: Carved from the most wondrous trees that grow only in Chult.
name: Wooden Bangles

description: More elegant arm wear for a more successful adventurer.
name: Metal Bangles

description: Beautiful bangles bought from an adventurous merchant.
name: Precious Inscribed Bangles of Chult

description: Someone hasn't been taking good care of their boots.
name: Scuffed Boots

description: Uncommonly soft and comfortable, they allow me to be light on my feet.
name: Soft Boots

description: A fine pair of boots with a padded sole.
name: Stealthy Boots

description: They'll never hear me coming.
name: Masterful Boots of Elvenkind

description: I had a similar sword in my youth. I outgrew it quickly.
name: Trainee's Greatsword

description: A sharp blade, but not too sharp that you'll slip up and grievously injure yourself.
name: Apprentice's Greatsword

description: A fine sword fit for a Chultan sword master.
name: Master's Greatsword

description: They'll never see me coming.
name: Deathbringer Greatsword

description: A simple periapt that grants some small magic.
name: Simple Periapt

description: A fine trinket passed down for generations.
name: Fine Periapt

description: A heroic amulet granted to me by a village leader after I saved some villagers.
name: Heroic Periapt

description: I pray that death will never find me, but if it does I'll be ready.
name: Periapt of Wound Closure

description: There's not much power left in this ring.
name: Cold Ring

description: Something lurks within. This ring holds a small amount of power.
name: Warm Ring

description: The beauty of this ring is eclipsed only by its power.
name: Emerald Ring

description: The power of this ring allows me to charge into battle carefree.
name: Ring of Protection

description: Nothing's worse than a cold neck. Not even this scarf.
name: Torn Scarf

description: A simple scarf to ward off the bitter wind.
name: Plain Scarf

description: A fine scarf purchased from a merchant in Port Nyanzaru.
name: Patterned Scarf

description: A masterfully crafted scarf found in the wreckage of the boat that brought me to Chult.
name: Tasselled Scarf of the Island

description: Even a blunt blade can bash in a skull.
name: Dull Battle Axe

description: Ah, a freshly sharpened axe. What more does a guy need?
name: Sharp Battle Axe

description: The craftsmanship is exquisite.
name: Cruel Battle Axe

description: A magical axe of extreme power. My enemies flee in fear when they see it.
name: Bonecleaver

description: A crude symbol, but any reverence to Tiamat is a good thing.
name: Crude Symbol

description: A well crafted symbol, though it lacks a certain finesse.
name: Steel Symbol

description: Forged in the dragonflame for only the most devout followers.
name: Flame Forged Symbol

description: I've foresworn my paladin oaths and dedicated my life to serving Tiamat.
name: Holy Symbol of Tiamat

description: Should probably get this tightened up. The noise is very distracting.
name: Clanking Pauldron

description: Good for bashing down doors and breaking through walls.
name: Solid Pauldron

description: I'll impale the heads of my enemies on these spikes! Hah hah hah!
name: Spiked Pauldron

description: Forged from obsidian and granted to me by the Dragon Queen herself.
name: Pauldron of the Dragonmother

description: It may be flimsy, but you still wouldn't want to get bashed by it.
name: Flimsy Shield

description: Don't let appearances deceive you. This is a sturdy, well-crafted shield.
name: Strong Shield

description: Blessed by the Cult of the Dragon and carried into battle against their enemies.
name: Dragon-Blessed Shield

description: Crafted from the scales of Tiamat's enemies and worn by her unholy Paladin followers.
name: Dragonscale Shield of the Unholy

description: Whatever is in it won't be in it for long!
name: Cracked Vial

description: A sturdy vial containing a murky, greyish liquid.
name: Sturdy Vial

description: A crystal vial with a finely crafted silver stopper.
name: Crystal Vial

description: Filled to the brim with unholy power.
name: Vial of Unholy Water

description: Reserved for only the most bad-ass warriors.
name: Rusty Choker

description: Mere child's play. Bring me a real choker.
name: Spiked Choker

description: A golden wreath of thorns worn about ones neck.
name: Golden Wreath

description: Grants me control over a beast of my choosing. I chose Chango.
name: Wreath of the Prism

description: Fits a moderate amount of gold pieces.
name: Basic Pouch

description: It doesn't look like much, but it can store quite a bit of loot.
name: Deep Pouch

description: Why have one pouch when you could have five?
name: Multi-Pouch

description: It's got everything you need to pillage and pilfer.
name: Burglar's Pack of the Sneaky Thief

description: Hey! My mother knit these for me.
name: Ugly Slippers

description: I think a spider crawled inside these and webbed them up.
name: Sticky Slippers

description: I can scale all but the slipperiest surfaces.
name: Sticky Boots

description: Useful for climbing giants and other extra tall creatures.
name: Boots of Spider Climbing

description: It was just hanging in the cloakroom of this Inn...
name: Pilfered Cape

description: I'll give it back when I'm done with it, I swear.
name: Borrowed Cape

description: It's impressive, much like myself!
name: Impressive Cape

description: It never gets tangled in my legs.
name: Magnificent Cape of Free Flowing

description: I really ought to sharpen this one.
name: Dull Dagger

description: I really ought to clean this one.
name: Bloody Dagger

description: Everything's better with a little gold added in.
name: Golden Dagger

description: Stolen from a foolish Prince from the east.
name: Ornate Dagger of Princes

description: The peddler swore it was real!
name: Fake Ring

description: There's a story behind this ring that I'll tell you some time.
name: Pearl Ring

description: That's 100% legitimate Icewind Crystal.
name: Crystal Ring

description: You can't hide your true form from me.
name: Zhentarim Ring of True Sight

description: A simple rod of copper. Useful for jimmying doors and windows.
name: Copper Rod

description: It's the fanciest thing I've ever jimmied a window with.
name: Fancy Rod

description: It has some small magical properties that makes it quite useful.
name: Static Rod

description: Magically enhanced to ignore the laws of physics.
name: Ancient Immovable Rod

description: I like cake too much to really be comfortable in this belt.
name: Tight Belt

description: The monks didn't let me bring much with me, except this.
name: Solemn Belt

description: There's more to this belt than meets the eye.
name: Tinkerer's Belt

description: I'll never talk about the day I got this belt.
name: Gnomish Belt of Solemn Secrets

description: Kind of defeats the purpose, don't it?
name: See-Through Blindfold

description: I can't see! Wait, no, that's the point.
name: Blinding Blindfold

description: The monks made me wear this during my training.
name: Supremely Effective Blindfold

description: A trophy from my time at the monastary.
name: Pure Blindfold of the Even Hand

description: I'd rather not stand out, to be honest.
name: Plain Ring

description: A little worse for wear from years of unarmed combat.
name: Scuffed Steel Ring

description: Forged near a Chultan volcano.
name: Obsidian Ring

description: I can really take my time to think things over.
name: Innoculous Ring of Time Slowing

description: A hand-sown hand-me-down.
name: Patched Robe

description: Granted to all new diciples of the Even Hand.
name: Initiate's Robe

description: Robes bearing the colors of the Order of the Even Hand.
name: Even Hand Robes

description: I remember the day I earned the right to wear these robes...
name: Monastic Robe of the Even Hand

description: The soles are a bit tough, but otherwise they're functional.
name: Plain Sandals

description: As comfortable for walking as they are for standing or sitting.
name: Comfortable Sandals

description: Flashy, for a monk, but I'm still a gnome, you know.
name: Intricate Sandals

description: All but my most perceptive foes are ignorant to my approach.
name: Ornate Sandals of the Silent Foot

description: I've tried binding it back together, but it's not very sturdy.
name: Snapped Staff

description: I've walked a long way with this staff.
name: Sturdy Staff

description: No matter how far you walk, you'll always end up back where you started.
name: Wanderer's Staff

description: It is much easier to focus on ki with this ancient staff.
name: Ki Staff of Long Walks

description: A basic amulet given to all orc children.
name: Stone Amulet

description: Obviously magical - it radiates heat.
name: Warm Amulet

description: An amulet of warding constructed by our tribal sage; doesn't really do anything.
name: Tribal Amulet

description: My father's amulet; worn in battle dozens, perhaps hundreds of time.
name: Bone Breaker Amulet of the Tribe

description: A simple belt; better to wear this than to have your pants fall down.
name: Cloth Belt

description: Softness isn't often a quality I admire, but I make an exception for this belt.
name: Soft Belt

description: A wizard's belt, but still useful to a warrior such as myself.
name: Ornate Belt

description: This belt belonged to my mother; it saw her safely through countless dangers.
name: Artisan Belt of the Way Finder

description: So much is missing; someone who learns history from this book is bound to repeat it.
name: Torn History Book

description: There are important lessons in all of our pasts.
name: Faded History Book

description: A detailed history of half-orc culture, written by myself.
name: Detailed History Book

description: A detailed encyclopedia of orc tribes and customs - my mother's life work.
name: Archaeologist's Book of Tribal History

description: It cracked when I hit a Stone Golem so hard that it shattered.
name: Cracked Warhammer

description: Heavy to carry around, but worth it in battle.
name: Solid Warhammer

description: A warrior needs every advantage to catch his enemy off guard.
name: Spiked Warhammer

description: My bonded warhammer has served me well throughout the years.
name: Vicious Warhammer of Orcish Bloodlust

description: I should probably get this replaced.
name: Pilling Scarf

description: Yes, I knit. What's your problem with that?
name: Hand-knit Scarf

description: A fine scarf, though not very warrior-ly.
name: Wizard's Scarf

description: A momento from my time training as an Eldritch Knight.
name: Flowing Scarf of the Eldritch Knight

description: Adaquete for a child perhaps, but I hope to find a new pair soon enough.
name: Weak Pauldron

description: Hardened leather can surprisingly deflect even strong and sharp attacks.
name: Tough Pauldron

description: A good shoulder charge never hurt anyone; perhaps just my enemies.
name: Spiked Pauldron

description: If magic fails me, these pauldrons will see me through.
name: Strong Iron Pauldron of the Charging Orc

description: An assortment of random pebbles from my journies.
name: Random Pebbles

description: Some polished stones that caught my eye.
name: Polished Pebbles

description: A considerable collection of colorful calcite.
name: Colorful Stones

description: I've collected a single pebble from each beach I've visited in my travels.
name: Carefully Collected Pristine Pebbles

description: It's more for show. These old bones don't fight as well as they used to.
name: Dull Spear

description: Held together with wax and sap and a short length of leather.
name: Damaged Spear

description: Danger lies around every corner these days.
name: Sharpened Spear

description: It doubles as a walking staff when the danger is past.
name: Masterful Spear of Long Journies

description: Full of knick-knacks from another time.
name: Old Pouch

description: The leather has been softened by years of use.
name: Soft Leather Pouch

description: This pouch has seen me through countless adventures.
name: Well Traveled Leather Pouch

description: There always seems to be something in this pouch to point me in the right direction.
name: Sacred Pouch of the Wayfinder

description: If I move too quickly, it could shatter. I'd better more slowly, then.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Gromma's Spiked Shell, Freezing Breeze and Acid Splash abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Delicate Headdress

description: The warm waters off the coast of Ahoyhoy are perfect for collecting discarded coral.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Gromma's Spiked Shell, Freezing Breeze and Acid Splash abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Coral Headdress

description: A special headdress crafted by one of my many offspring.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Gromma's Spiked Shell, Freezing Breeze and Acid Splash abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Braided Headdress

description: A gift from the first of my grandchildren to leave the compound and explore the lands.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Gromma's Spiked Shell, Freezing Breeze and Acid Splash abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Intricate Headdress of the Grandmother

description: Its days are numbered.
name: Fragile Conch

description: You can hear the ocean if you put it up to your ear.
name: Hearty Conch

description: This large conch is older than I am, and I'm practically ancient.
name: Ancient Conch

description: Recovered from the slimy tentacles of a slain Marine Decapus.
name: Spiked Conch of the Deep Ocean

description: Covered in itchy, scratching sand.
name: Sandy Bracelet

description: A single, brilliant pearl makes this bracelet worth wearing.
name: Single Pearl Bracelet

description: Crafted for me by a young human during a recent visit to Port Nyanzaru.
name: Dual-Banded Bracelet

description: If you put your ear up to the pearl, you can hear the approach of strong storms.
name: Solemn Bone Bracelet of the Wind

description: An embaressment to belts everywhere.
name: Tattered Belt

description: A belt for someone who spends too much time reading and not enough time being amazing.
name: Scholar's Belt

description: Adaquete for a wizard from the coast, perhaps, but someone as great as Dhadius!
name: Wizard's Belt

description: I certainly am that.
name: Glorious Belt of the Impressive Wizard

description: A bracer for a lesser mage. I object to wearing it, honestly.
name: Clumsy Bracer

description: Provides some deflection, I suppose. Not that I need it.
name: Leather Bracer

description: Empowers my already formidable magical abilities.
name: Arcane Bracer

description: Well, if you say so.
name: Wonderous Bracer of the Greatest Wizard

description: It'll do until I can get back into my usual wardrobe.
name: Ratty Cloak

description: It's not mine, I'm just borrowing it.
name: Apprentice's Cloak

description: Velvet is the hallmark of impressive wizards, you know.
name: Velvet Cloak

description: I am respected, aren't I?
name: Flowing Cloak of the Respected Wizard

description: In the hands of an amazing wizard such as myself, even a simple ring can be powerful.
name: Tin Ring

description: It may not look like much - or be much, for that matter - but it's mine, so it's impressive.
name: Shiny Iron Ring

description: Just a single touch can turn a man to ice. Or make them somewhat chilly, at least.
name: Frosted Ring

description: Not that I have to prove myself to anyone.
name: Frozen Ring of the Proven Wizard

description: Nothing a little ingenuity can't fix.
name: Cracked Staff

description: If your staff isn't glowing, you're not wizarding right.
name: Glowing Staff

description: Shining like the statue of me in the Luskan harbour will be. Once I get my due.
name: Shining Staff

description: Are you sure 'legendary' is the right word? It seems too simple to me.
name: Brilliant Staff of the Legendary Wizard

description: The Arcane Brotherhood's symbol should never be displayed so dimly.
name: Dull Amulet

description: It's a little difficult to handle. Shocks you when you touch it.
name: Sparking Amulet

description: A wonderful symbol of the Brotherhood.
name: Onyx Arcane Brotherhood Amulet

description: I certainly wouldn't want to assume a rank, but that sounds about right.
name: Master's Amulet of the Arcane Brotherhood

description: The first scimitar I used in my training with Zaknafein.
name: Cracked Scimitar

description: An instrument of death in the hands of an experienced drow warrior.
name: Sharp Scimitar

description: It pulses with a soft icy glow.
name: Frostbrand Scimitar

description: Found in the treasure hoard of the white dragon Ingeloakastimizilian, better known as Icingdeath.
name: Icingdeath

description: A dull weapon suitable for training young Drow in the ways of battle.
name: Dull Scimitar

description: A slender weapon; far more deadly than a bulky greatsword.
name: Lithe Scimitar

description: An experienced warrior can use a sword for defense as well as offense.
name: Defender Scimitar

description: Gifted to me by a Harpell of all people. One of the few sane ones.
name: Twinkle

description: An apt metaphor for myself, if I'm being introspective.
name: Tattered Cloak

description: Allows you to blend in with the stony crags and otherworldly fungi of the Underdark.
name: Underdark Cloak

description: There was a time I would have been thrilled to receive this cloak. Now I use it because I must.
name: Drow Ranger's Cloak

description: Gifted to me by the Weeping Friars. Strange folk.
name: Hooded Cloak of the Faerûn Hero

description: It would be better if you simply didn't get hit while wearing this.
name: Flimsy Chest Piece

description: A generic leather chest piece. Not much to note.
name: Leather Chest Piece

description: Aids me in moving quickly and silently through most terrain.
name: Drow Ranger's Chest Piece

description: I miss my homeland some days, but I don't miss the pain and strife that consumes that place.
name: Chest Piece of the Lost Homeland

description: A children's play-thing.
name: Panther Toy

description: It has been painted black to resemble a more powerful artifact.
name: Tin Statue

description: Transforms into a black panther upon command. Not Guenhwyvar, though.
name: Onyx Figurine

description: A unique figurine that summons my faithful companion, Guenhwyvar.
name: Figurine of Guenhwyvar

description: An apprentice's replica of a far more powerful artifact.
name: Steel Charm

description: A simple charm engraved with a unicorn motif.
name: Engraved Charm

description: Can be used to summon a faithful unicorn mount, if you are worthy.
name: Unicorn Necklace

description: The ruling council of Silverymoon granted me Andarhar as gratitude for my service.
name: Horn Charm of Mielikki

description: Still sturdy enough to cause damage, if ye know what yer doin'.
name: Cracked Hammer

description: A hammer's just a chunk o' iron 'til it's in the hands of a proper warrior.
name: Stout Hammer

description: The last thing me enemies see before Gorm takes 'em.
name: Shining Hammer

description: A beacon of hope for all who see its mighty swing. Enemies not included, of course.
name: Golden Hammer of Clan Undurr

description: A sad thing, but it's nice to have somethin' to follow.
name: Ratty Banner

description: As durable as the Order of the Gauntlet itself.
name: Durable Banner

description: Brings a tear to me eye seein' it flap in the wind.
name: Waving Banner

description: The Order is my home now. I shall follow them to the end o' time.
name: Order of the Gauntlet Banner

description: Even the craggiest chunk of brass can have great meaning.
name: Dull Brass Symbol

description: There was a time that I dinnae know what this symbol meant.
name: Dwarf-Forged Symbol

description: In me time of need, Gorm has been a shining beacon of hope.
name: Symbol of Gorm

description: Gorm Gulthyn himself has chosen me as his emissary, of this I am sure.
name: Faithful Golden Amulet of Gorm

description: Protects me waist and me legs! A little on the heavy side, though.
name: Heavy Belt

description: Yer gonna need a strong blow to get through this.
name: Iron Plated Belt

description: I was thinkin' one day, what haven't I plated in gold yet? Then I looked down.
name: Gold Plated Belt

description: It is my solemn duty to aid those in need and defend those who cannae defend themselves.
name: Shining Belt of the Devout Cleric

description: I'm one tough dwarf to crack.
name: Steel Breastplate

description: Ye can never have enough gold on yer armor, ye know.
name: Ornate Breastplate

description: A masterfully crafted breastplate, if I ever saw one.
name: Gemmed Breastplate

description: Perhaps a little over the top, yea, but if it causes just one enemy to pause, it's done its job.
name: Bejewelled Breastplate of Dwarves

description: The old helm of my beloved, Storn Skulldark.
name: Used Helmet

description: Granted to me by the Order of the Gauntlet when I joined their ranks.
name: New Helmet

description: Dinnae worry about me, it's reinforced with good dwarven steel.
name: Jewelled Helmet

description: Granted only to the Order's most devout and effective followers.
name: Brilliant Helmet of the Order

description: I prefer sneaking to stabbing, to be honest.
name: Dull Dagger

description: This is what happens when you try to fight. Your nice things get chipped.
name: Chipped Dagger

description: A solid dagger for a solid fellow, if I do say so myself.
name: Halfling's Dagger

description: I'd rather not use this. It's quite nice and pristine.
name: Inscribed Dagger of the Hesitant Rogue

description: It kind of... bends... when you swing it.
name: Light Mace

description: Orcs don't take too kindly to being bopped by this mace. Take it from me.
name: Dented Mace

description: This mace and I have travelled many roads together.
name: Traveller's Mace

description: Did I ever tell you about the time I ruled the Mithral Hall?
name: Short Mace of Dwarven Rule

description: This ruby ought to fetch a good price in Baldur's Gate.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Encouragement ability by $(amount)%.

name: Dull Ruby Amulet

description: It certainly is alluring.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Encouragement ability by $(amount)%.

name: Shiny Ruby Amulet

description: I suspect it holds some magical power.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Encouragement ability by $(amount)%.

name: Pulsing Ruby Amulet

description: Oh, don't worry. He won't miss it. He's got eleven others.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Encouragement ability by $(amount)%.

name: Pasha Pook's Ruby Amulet

description: Spoiled?! I fished it up just a few days ago.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Weakness ability by $(amount)%.

name: Spoiled Trout

description: A trout worthy of an adventurer's lunch sack, if I ever saw one.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Weakness ability by $(amount)%.

name: Dry Trout

description: Who doesn't like a nice snack mid-adventure?

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Weakness ability by $(amount)%.

name: Filet o' Knuckhead

description: The perfect snack for a journey to Icewind Dale.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Regis' Ruby Weakness ability by $(amount)%.

name: Freshly Salted Knucklehead Trout

description: You put things in and they almost immediately fall out.
name: Holey Bag

description: Certainly won't fall apart on you, no matter how long your travels.
name: Sturdy Bag

description: For when your journey may be longer than your foresight.
name: Traveller's Bag

description: It's like a Bag of Holding, except completely plain and non-magical.
name: Halfling's Bag of Stashing

description: If you're going to fight, you may as well be wearing a hat.
name: Faded Beret

description: If you're going to fight, you may as well be comfortable.
name: Comfortable Beret

description: If you're going to fight, you may as well be fashionable.
name: Fashionable Beret

description: Rather than fight, why not simply blend in with the enemy?
name: Protective Beret of Disguise

description: Sharper and lighter than an iron sword.
name: Steel Shortsword

description: Sturdy but heavy, enough to inflict damage with some moderate effort.
name: Iron Shortsword

description: This blade sings the songs of battle.
name: Singing Sword

description: It never needs to be sharpened, much like my wit!
name: Hardy Sword of Sharpness

description: Simple bracers fashioned from discarded cloth.
name: Cloth Bracers

description: These wraps provide moderate defense, but primarily help brace my arm in battle.
name: Wrapped Bracers

description: A stable bracer that aids in both attack and defense.
name: Hardened Leather Bracers

description: If you look hard enough, you can find music in everything.
name: Reinforced Bracers of Song

description: Produces a rusty, clanging sound. Good enough to keep tempo in battle.
name: Brass Anklet

description: They may not aid in stealth, but my songs are much more potent.
name: Ringing Anklet

description: Empowers my allies against the darkness and the dead.
name: Jingling Anklet

description: Rings true and proud as I wade though battle.
name: Perfect Anklet of Pure Pitch

description: A bit out a tune, but it's cheap.
name: Simple Lute

description: This magical instrument creates a unique and empowering sound.
name: Doss Lute

description: The golden frets create a sound which can be heard over great distances.
name: Gold-inlaid Lute

description: An instrument as finely crafted as one could ever hope to own.
name: Masterwork Lute of Rest

description: It would not help if my pants fell down during battle.
name: Simple Belt

description: An alligator thought it could best me in combat. Obviously it did not.
name: Alligator Leather Belt

description: A raptor's hide -- if you can take one down -- is extremely durable.
name: Dinosaur Hide Belt

description: Who says you can't be fashionable in battle?
name: Gold-inlaid Belt of Tempo

description: A little worse for wear, but it's better than nothing.
name: Padded Cloth Pauldron

description: Made in native Chultan fashion, with a few extra Chult-specific dangers in mind.
name: Chultan Pauldron

description: With raptor-like scales fashioned from silver, this tunic provides excellent defense and mobility.
name: Silver Scale Tunic

description: Lighter than it appears, this armor both looks good and provides unparallelled defense.
name: Sapphire-inlaid Linked Armor

description: A little tougher to reload than your average crossbow.
name: Rusty Crossbow

description: A sturdy crossbow, though its destructive potential is lackluster.
name: Oak Crossbow

description: Reinforced with an alloy of my own invention.
name: Reinforced Crossbow

description: The draw strength is several times higher than any gnome could manage unaided.
name: Thunderbolt

description: Well worn and still warm, but not ideal for tracking prey through the forest.
name: Worn Cloak

description: A simple cloak made for someone of a shorter stature, like myself.
name: Gnome's Cloak

description: Blends in with the forest, allowing me to pass unseen.
name: Blending Cloak

description: Even all these years later, my heart still beats faster when I see a dark elf.
name: Long Ranger's Cloak of Vengeance

description: It's still got a few bolts left; they'll have to do.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Zorbu's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Nearly Empty Quiver

description: It won't tear or rip when I grab a bolt.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Zorbu's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Tough Hide Quiver

description: As finely crafted a quiver as a ranger could hope for.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Zorbu's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Finely Crafted Quiver

description: The capacity of this quiver never seems to expire.

effects.description: Increases the effect of Zorbu's Favored Enemy abilities by $(amount)%.

name: Bursting Quiver of the Endless Barrage

description: Scrapped together from a few failed experiments.
name: Patchwork Glasses

description: They're heavy, but it's better than being blind!
name: Heavy Metal Glasses

description: Have you read the latest symposium on clockwork animals? Fascinating!
name: Gnomish Reading Glasses

description: When you're as old as I am, a good set of glasses is a lifesaver.
name: Bifocal Glasses of the Aged Gnome

description: Go on, skibbers! You can make it!
name: Rusty Mechanical Squirrel

description: That... can't be good.
name: Sparking Mechanical Squirrel

description: Come on, buddy! You can make it!
name: Skittering Mechanical Squirrel

description: I call him skibbers! He goes boom!
name: Clockwork Squirrel of Alchemist's Fire

description: It's missing a few important tools, but I can make do.
name: Sparse Toolset

description: This ol' set has gotten me out of more than a couple close scrapes.
name: Worn Toolset

description: Every tool you could ever want. No nozzle, nail, or nut can withstand me.
name: Complete Toolset

description: If skibbers does his job right, I'll need this set to fix him up.
name: Tinker's Toolset of Total Annihilation

description: It's a *good* mold.
name: Moldy Snacks

description: I made them just for you.
name: Sad Snacks

description: No promises that the flavors are tasty.
name: Flavorful Snacks

description: There's barely anything that will kill you!
name: Tasty Snicketty Snooks

description: 'Get a new hat,' they say. No, I like this one! It's comfy!
name: Tattered Witch Hat

description: It got caught on a bramble in Barovia.
name: Torn Witch Hat

description: Holey, not holy! Very much not holy.
name: Holey Witch Hat

description: What?! There's all that wasted space!
name: Snack-Filled Witch Hat

description: That's not dirt, that's Stinky!
name: Dirty Pot

description: I really should patch that up someday.
name: Leaking Pot

description: Dang rat's heavier now than he was when he was alive.
name: Large Heavy Pot

description: I miss my old cranium rat. RIP, buddy.
name: Polished Pot of Stinky's Ashes

description: Hey, there's some good stuff in there!
name: Assorted Garbage

description: Garbage? I'll show you garbage!
name: Pile of Garbage

description: They're irreplacable!
name: Collected Knick-Knacks

description: I can't believe nobody else wants this stuff! It's priceless!
name: Super High Quality Garbage

description: I can't quite make out the runes. They look kinda magic.

effects.description: Increases the damage of Strix while one of her Ultimates is active by $(amount)%.

name: Dim Staff

description: A solid staff for someone who knows magic.

effects.description: Increases the damage of Strix while one of her Ultimates is active by $(amount)%.

name: Black Wooden Staff

description: Do you think maybe it knows magic?

effects.description: Increases the damage of Strix while one of her Ultimates is active by $(amount)%.

name: Mystical Runed Staff

description: I know magic!

effects.description: Increases the damage of Strix while one of her Ultimates is active by $(amount)%.

name: Polymorphing Staff of the Trash Witch

description: Stinky? I don't smell anything.
name: Stinky Owlbear Cloak

description: The hem doesn't drag along the ground. I'd rather it did.
name: Short Owlbear Cloak

description: Keeps me cozy in cold places.
name: Warm Owlbear Cloak

description: I can hide within its folds if I need to.
name: Dark Owlbear Cloak of the Sad Sorcerer

description: Still functions as a passable stave. I will need to get this sharpened.
name: Dull Naginata

description: A decent enough material, for your type at least.
name: Steel Naginata

description: Aha! Gith silver is unparallelled in battle. For Zaerith!
name: Silver Naginata

description: The force of this Naginata disrupts the Illithid's psionic field.
name: Kensei Naginata of Illithid Slaying

description: They are quite comfortable, unlike your Material Plane.
name: Woven Bracers

description: Your world is cold and unpleasant, but I will adapt.
name: Dyed Wool Bracers

description: I would prefer a Limbo-crafted pair, but these will do.
name: Fine Bracers

description: Crafted by Githzerai artificers out of Limbo chaos-stuff.
name: Chaotic Bracers of the Githzerai

description: Well that's not much use to me now, is it?
name: Sealed Jug

description: Almost as useless as a sealed jug, but at least I can fill it.
name: Empty Jug

description: A wonderous device. Would you like 2 gallons of mayonnaise?
name: Alchemy Jug

description: Useful for long journeys through the Material Plane, such as the one I'm on.
name: Overflowing Alchemy Jug

description: A trinket. A toy. Not of much use, to be honest.
name: Ruby Amulet

description: A precious gem for you, perhaps, but easily come by in Limbo.
name: Bloodstone Amulet

description: Only when one is calm can one access Ki.
name: Calming Amulet

description: The swirling reminds me of Limbo.
name: Planar Amulet of Homecoming

description: A simple accessory, but comforting in this strange place.
name: Short Scarf

description: Keeps me warm during cold Material Plane nights.
name: Heavy Scarf

description: Flits and flutters behind me in battle.
name: Embroidered Scarf

description: When my Ki is centered, the scarf barely flutters at all.
name: Scarf of Fluid Motion

description: Perhaps it once held some small magic.
name: Depleted Ioun Stone

description: Its magic barely strong enough to detect, let alone make use of.
name: Dim Ioun Stone

description: I can't be surprised when this stone's magic is active.
name: Ioun Stone of Awareness

description: Wisdom isn't something the Githzerai lack, but this takes it to a new level.
name: Pulsing Ioun Stone of Wisdom

description: It has seen battle more than once, and it'll see battle again.
name: Well Worn Longbow

description: If I had a copper for every knock-off elven bow I've seen...
name: Fine Elven Longbow

description: As finely crafted a bow as you will ever see!
name: Polished Wood Longbow

description: Also known as Heartseeker. My shots never miss.
name: Taulmaril

description: Simple yet effective.
name: Leather Bracers

description: Bracers fit for any warrior, but these are mine.
name: Warrior's Bracers

description: Fine northern craftsmanship. You won't find its like to the south.
name: Fine Studded Bracers

description: A gift from Bruenor Battlehammer. Perhaps you know him?
name: Mithral Embedded Bracers

description: Has anyone got a spare whetstone?
name: Dull Dagger

description: Blood and dirt will ruin a good dagger.
name: Polished Dagger

description: A little flashy perhaps, but it still cuts true.
name: Embellished Dagger

description: Never let them see you coming.
name: Elven Dagger of the Ambush

description: Hair in the face is never good in battle.
name: Iron Hairclip

description: Lighter and more durable than other hairclips I've tried.
name: Steel Hairclip

description: It seemed like a lot of coin to spend on a hairclip, but it's worth it.
name: Mastercraft Hairclip

description: Forged in Mithral Hall by the best smithies in Faerûn.
name: Mithral Hairclip of the Companion

description: Substance over style -- at least until I can get better style.
name: Dull Breastplate

description: A bow does no good if a dagger kills you first.
name: Solid Breastplate

description: The craftsmanship is incredible.
name: Inscribed Copper Breastplate

description: Champion? I've heard it said, though others deserve the title more than I.
name: Shining Breastplate of the Champion

description: Not much use right now, but I can always fletch more arrows.
name: Empty Quiver

description: Nothing's worse than a floppy quiver.
name: Sturdy Quiver

description: Arrows from this quiver always strike true.
name: Heartseeking Quiver

description: Alongside its companion, Taulmaril, this quiver is priceless.
name: Quiver of Anariel

description: I dented it flying into battle against Strahd. It's fine, though!
name: Chipped Battleaxe

description: I'm sure it'll sharpen itself! Let's keep fighting!
name: Dulled Battleaxe

description: The light itself loves this axe!
name: Shining Battleaxe

description: My beloved battleaxe, reforged!
name: Lightfall

description: C'mon little guy! Let's go for a run!
name: Chubby Mouse

description: Wake up little buddy!
name: Sleepy Mouse

description: What's that? What do you smell?
name: Alert Mouse

description: Careful, Juniper. I don't trust that Boo.
name: Armored Juniper

description: I've had this amulet since I was a young noble.
name: Child's Amulet

description: Does anyone have a cloth? I need to polish this thing!
name: Scuffed Amulet

description: The light protects me while I wear this amulet.
name: Shining Symbol

description: Strahd will never see us coming. Right guys?!
name: Holy Symbol of Ravenkind

description: This just won't do. I'll never protect the party with this!
name: Flimsy Breastplate

description: Sometimes you've got to take the hit, but I'm still standing.
name: Dented Breastplate

description: Lathander appreciates well polished armor.
name: Polished Breastplate

description: The light will protect me!
name: Shining Breastplate of Lathander

description: I think it's time to go shopping!
name: Moldy Boots

description: I feel almost weightless.
name: Light Boots

description: Once you get used to it, flying isn't half bad.
name: Flying Boots

description: Charging into battle for the light!
name: Winged Boots of the Dawn

description: Some pretty things that Strix didn't want.
name: Few Pretty Things

description: Aren't they pretty?!
name: Several Pretty Things

description: I'm not really sure what's in here, but they're pretty!
name: Sack of Pretty Things

description: Don't tell Strix. She'll judge me.
name: Hoard of Pretty Things
